product_overview: AgriAssist is an AI-powered web application designed to provide real-time, multilingual agricultural assistance to farmers in Kerala, India. It integrates advanced AI query handling, image analysis for plant disease diagnosis, real-time weather data, and a comprehensive agricultural knowledge base to support farming decisions.
core_goals: Deliver accurate and timely AI-powered answers to farming-related queries in English and Malayalam.
Provide real-time weather updates and agricultural alerts specific to Kerala region.
Enable farmers to identify plant diseases through photo uploads and AI image analysis.
Offer seasonal and crop-specific farming guidance via an interactive agricultural calendar and knowledge base.
Ensure a user-friendly, responsive interface accessible on both desktop and mobile devices.
key_features: AI Query Interface with multilingual (English and Malayalam) support and real-time voice input.
Image Analysis Service leveraging Google Gemini API for plant disease identification through photo uploads.
Weather Integration with current weather data, alerts, and an agricultural calendar.
Comprehensive Knowledge Base including PDF agricultural documents integration and retrieval augmented generation (RAG) for enhanced responses.
Responsive design using Tailwind CSS with intuitive navigation and real-time feedback.
Backend services powered by Flask for handling queries, image processing, and PDF knowledge base integration.
Camera integration using WebRTC for capturing plant images directly within the app.
Notification system delivering browser alerts for weather and farming tips.
Crop Calculator tool for profit analysis and crop planning.
Expert Network connecting farmers with agricultural officers and experts.
Community Hub providing a platform for farmer networking and support.
Multilingual help and support system embedded throughout the application.
user_flow_summary: Users start at the AI Query Interface to submit questions either by text or voice in English or Malayalam.
Users can capture or upload images of plants for disease diagnosis via the image analysis feature.
The system provides instant AI-generated answers powered by Google Gemini API and enriched with PDF-based knowledge.
Users access real-time weather updates and receive notifications for weather alerts or farming tips.
Farmers consult the agricultural calendar for seasonal guidance and crop-specific information.
Users utilize the crop calculator for profit estimation and planning.
Farmers engage with experts through the expert network and participate in community discussions via the community hub.
Help and support are accessible at any point in the app for multilingual assistance and troubleshooting.
validation_criteria: AI responses to agricultural queries must be accurate with response times under 2 seconds.
Image analysis correctly identifies plant diseases with high accuracy.
Weather data and alerts are reliably updated in real-time.
The app interface is fully responsive and functions correctly on both desktop and mobile devices.
Voice input for queries works reliably in supported languages.
PDF knowledge base integration enhances response quality and relevance.
Crop calculator provides accurate profit estimates based on input data.
Expert network and community features facilitate meaningful farmer engagement.
All multilingual features (English and Malayalam) are consistent and user-friendly throughout the application.
